name: 2-Dates Dating Simulator
description:
A dating simulator I made for fun with some characters I had lying around. Each character has a good, neutral, bad and secret ending.  I'll add updates/more dialogue/character interactions/more secrets depending on how many people like the game, but for now it's just something to work on in my free time. I hope you all like it, and let me know what you think (and let me know if you find any bugs)!

I'm trying to find a way to upload it so it's playable in browser. If it doesn't work then just download the zip file instead!

Human reskin coming soon!
